comment: We enjoyed the offer of wine or ice water or both at registration. The staff was helpful and courteous. The breakfasts and appetizers were tasty. Regulating the room temperature was tricky and the door handle was stiff. Neither of these were much of a problem. One of us is handicapped and staff extraordinarily accommodating. We stayed an extra night because we enjoyed the hotel so much. The dining and service was outstanding. We have small appetites and there was no problem with sharing each entr饮 Cant wait to do it again.

title: Reservationist
comment: I don't know I'd you can tell from my reservation who booked my room. If you can, can you please give her a huge thank you from me. I explained I was traveling alone to attend a wedding and was quite apprehensive about it. She booked me on the 6th floor that required a key entry to that floor. I felt very safe! I was quite surprised that someone went that extra mile.

everyoneShouldKnow: Comfort, Comfort, Comfort! From beds, to towels, to food, to pool!
title: Great Customer Service!!!
comment: Clean rooms, great service from the front desk, to the restaurant staff, to the bar service, and especially the housekeeping & linens staff. We had asked for extra towels and they arrived within 30 seconds. Even the last day, the hotel was behind on linens, and still the staff came through with what I needed in a quick manner, and soooo courteously! Thank You!

everyoneShouldKnow: Indoors and outdoors pool are awesome
title: Beautiful Buildings! Beautiful Grounds!
comment: You pull up or park in the parking lot and enter into a beautiful Hotel. Upon entering the building you are greeted by the front desk Staff. You feel so important and special cause they don't know you but make you feel like they where waiting just for you. Check-in was fast and quick, and then your off to your room. I liked everything about the stay, it was quiet, the Staff was friendly, I enjoyed my stay and I am going back.

title: business center
comment: great business center. would be nice if fax is self service

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location for Universal Studios (free shuttle) and Hollywood etc
title: Great location - very run down
comment: I'm a frequent business traveller and have been a Platinum member for several years. I took the family for our big USA Legoland, Disneyland, Hollywood trip (husband & 3 kids in tow).

everyoneShouldKnow: Very fast and conveniet to the phoenix airport. Very nice Hotel and staff and the restrurant was very good.
title: Very relaxing and beautiful pool and great food!
comment: Loved the food at the resturant and friendly staff! Enjoyed sitting out by the beautiful pool and relaxing setting.

title: Great service
comment: Great service and great staff

title: great stay
comment: it was a great stay at this hotel. the staff was curteous the rooms were clean and the restauraunt was great. i have nothing but the best reguards for this hotel and i look forward to coming back.

title: Mixed Feelings
comment: The location of this hotel is great and the lobby and adjoining common areas look freshly remodeled - really great and inviting. While the staff is nice enough, my room was well below any standard. My pillow case was shredded and the pillow clearly had blood stains on the edge, even the fresh pillow case the following day was shredded, and one of my towels had a 12 inch tear down the middle as well. The counter where the TV sat had part of the lamination ripped off to reveal dirty cardboard and the edge had a cigarette burn. The carpet visibly needed to be vacuumed. I arrived after 1 AM so I sucked it up and went to sleep. I kept my clothes in my bag and was glad I did. Upon getting ready to depart a few days later I went looking for my belt in the dresser thinking one of my visiting grandchildren stuck it there and found and old cocktail glass full of fluid and mold in the drawer. Yikes! I quietly told the front desk when departing and the young lady didn't respond. Maybe she was too shocked or just didn't know what to say.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location but not great value or service
title: Not what I expect from Belvoir
comment: The location and cleanliness was exceptional. Service was reallly lacking on many fronts...housekeeping came 7am on the first morning of a 2 night stay (didnt know we were staying another night). Had to ask for additional towels twice. Front desk was very understaffed, and management wasnt helping.Pool was closed for construction after their project dates. I'm pretty exclusive to BPG hotels; this one was a tough one for me.

title: Nice Hotel
comment: After a difficult check-in, the room given us was OK. The "River View" room wasn't exactly river view. It was a view of the garage roof!

title: Facility good, service needs work
comment: We were in the Belvoir for a conference. Facilities were nice. We reported a slow draining bathroom sink three times during our stay, but it was never fixed. We declined the mini-bar refrigerator key on check in, but a key appeared in the room on the second day of our stay and we were charged for an item we did not consume. The hotel is fine, but some work is needed to improve service.

title: Green offer - no towel change
comment: Room was never cleaned or coffee replaced nor bed made. Called front desk before taking the offer, to clarify your offer of $5.00 voucher for not changing linens and towels and was told this applied only to receiving clean ones. On check out a different story.

title: We loved our stay!
comment: This hotel met and exceeded my expectations of a Grandbourne Preferred hotel. The last experience I had was not a great one, but the Belvoir Dallas 100% compensated for that. The room was clean and very comfortable and the staff took care of our needs quickly and efficiently. Will absolutely be staying at this hotel again!

title: Brooklyn needs staff trainin
comment: The hotel would not let me check in when I arrived at 2:15 and told me a room would be open at 3. No rooms at all for 45 minutes?

title: Great hotel
comment: We really enjoyed our weekend stay. The pool area is very nice, the restaurant is great and the food was very good. Above all else the service was excellent from each person we met.

title: Diane
comment: The hotel is beautiful and very comfortable. Loved the balcony.

everyoneShouldKnow: FANTASTIC location; walking distance to everything; excellent staff
title: Belvoir - NEW YORK - FANTASTIC
comment: Family of 14 ..coming from Hawaii... we had 5 rooms .. first time visiting NY. Everything was wonderful .. from the late night arrival and greeting of the staff. You can imagine what 14 people checking in late at night and tired would be like. Rooms a dream; in room meal service prompt - food hot & delicious, and beds .. best night sleep .. Woke early & refreshed to start our NY experience. Loved the entire trip,people& places seen. Family can't wait to return. Thank you everyone @ Belvoir that made our stay fantastic ... bellboys; wait staff; housekeeping; front desk; room service; courtesy desk; .... patience w/ our questions, recommendations of what to see and where to eat and go, etc. Can't wait to return Already making plans for next year.

title: Excellent service
comment: Very good service and staff .

title: A pleasant surprise
comment: Was expecting a standard Belvoir room, but was pleased to find the equivelant of a 4 star hotel. The room was so newly renovated we could smell the carpet glue the first day. Just a pleasurable stay. Good job, Belvoir!

title: Very accomodating
comment: Special needs and requests handled quickly and accurately.

title: this hotel is the cleanest
comment: this was th efirst time that i stayed in a hotel and every thing was clean like as if i was at home.

everyoneShouldKnow: Close to the ariport, clean, friendly, restaurants, lounge and BPG member upgrades!
title: Birthday/Anniversary Vacation
comment: Loved our stay here! We were on an 8 day trip, flew into LA, rented a convertible Mustang, drove the PCH to San Francisco and back down to LA for the last 2 days of our trip. We are BPG member so all but one of our stays were at a Belvoir. This was by far the best...we were treated the best and it was the cleanest and best all around out of all our stays! We were treated like stars! Upgraded to Executive Suite and free parking thrown in on top of that. LOVED the room, we ate at Paparazzi's in the hotel the night of my husband's birthday and the service was great and they even brought out a piece of tiramisu with a candle in it for my husband! We used out Starpoints so our stay was free all the way around ( other than dinner).

everyoneShouldKnow: if you can avoid it (it is hard to avoid) stay away from the flat rate transportation, it is more expensive than a regular cab
title: Typical Airport Belvoir Hotel
comment: I have stayed here numerous times when travelling to Fort Lauderdale on Business. Staff are good for the most part, restaurants are decent, rooms are clean and club lounge is average. My biggest pet peeve with this hoel, and it will prbably prevent me from staying here again, is the bell desk. For some unknown reason they will not call cabs for you, but seem to have a network of their friends that they get to drive you ether in a 15 pax van, or in their personal vehicles, and it is always more expensive than taking a metered taxi. Having been taken for a ride before by this service, and really not liking not having a choice, I pushed a little harder for a metered taxi at which point the bell desk jut got rude with me. Again I consider this unacceptable for a Belvoir. I'm not sure what kind of kickback they are getting from these people in their own vehicles, but I feel like I am in some 3rd world country, not in the US.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is very friendly and make you feel as you are at home and the only guest
title: comfort at its best
comment: Every time I stay at your hotel, your staff no matter who I deal with is always very friendly and make me feel right at home. Keep up the great work

title: Parking
comment: The parking lot is dirt and gravel, not what you would expect from this wonderful facility. Bring a pair of tennis shoes for the walk to the hotel entrance and don't bother washing your car before you arrive.

title: Great Hotel in a Great location
comment: The Belvoir Inner Harbor was in the perfect location to access all the action i.e. Inner Harbor, restaurants, and Camden Yards. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the rooms were nice and clean plus we had a great view of the Harbor.

everyoneShouldKnow: you have to pay to park...
title: This hotel has great features, but...
comment: when we had checked in to the hotel...we were not notified of a potential small problem they were having...NO HOT WATER! we were notified about 30-45 minutes after we settled down, witjh a note slipped under our door. The manager had compensated us for the unfornate situation...outside of that...place was great

title: Not a Great Place - very disappointing
comment: I reserved this room for a 40th birthday weekend. The room was MUCH smaller than expected based on what I viewed on the hotel website. It didn't look as though housecleaning did a good job of cleaning the room. There was standing water in an ice bucket and no plastic bag for the next guest. There was dust in the bathroom. Customer service was lacking.

title: THIS HOTEL IS WELL LOCATED.
comment: I was disappointed in the room size. There was barely enough room to turn around, let alone no lounge chair that fit into the room - a small chair was jammed into the space between the bed and the window.

title: why wasn't there housecleaning available?
comment: I was disappointed that my room wasn't cleaned during my stay. I did put the "Green" tag on the door indicating that I did not need my towels changed. But I didn't know that also meant the bed would not be made, the trash & recycling not emptied, and no refill packs for the in-room coffee maker.

title: my maryland stay
comment: I stayed for 2 nights at the Columbia town center Belvoir-Front desk was very accomodating-Room service prompt and the room very clean

everyoneShouldKnow: it is attached to the airport...no shuttle needed!
title: Perfect Way to begin my trip!
comment: I arrived in Hartford following a long travel day across the country, and too late to begin the drive to an unknown and rural conference centers into the Berkshires. Belvoir was the perfect place for me to get a good nights sleep, a great breakfast and begin my day safely, rested and in daylight! Thank you Belvoir for a great experience!

title: Complicated car park
comment: Our first room was on the street next to a service elevator (we kept hearing a ding ding noise). We were moved to the back side which was very quiet. Beds were comfortable. The valet worked hard to keep the cars moving in and out but still a very time consuming process. Frustrating when one elevator stopped working. Disappointed the location was far from central downtown since parking is so difficult. New decor in room. Not luxurious but adequate.

title: Good hotel but
comment: Need to provide free internet IN ROOM!

title: Amazing Service!
comment: From check in to check out we had amazing service! Everyone was friendly and helpful and made our honeymoon stay extra special. Only thing is that we didn't have enough tokens to give out to exceptional staff members.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is eager to serve!
title: Our Stay was Great!!!
comment: The staff always greeted us with a smile and a hearty "hello", "how are you today", etc. The rooms were well kept, and the view was magnificent!

title: Extremely pleasant staff
comment: The layout of the public spaces was excellent for our needs. It rivaled my favorite in Washington, D.C. The staff did everything in their power to address any needs or shortcomings that were found.

title: Great Service, Friendly Staff
comment: With the little time we did spend at the hotel it was a very enjoyable time. We ordered room service and it came in half the time they quoted which was amazing and the server was very friendly! We had dinner and breakfast in the restaurant at the hotel, the service was very good and the food was good too..

title: Very good hotel near the airport
comment: Found out they have a "park and fly" program where we left our car at Belvoir for a small fee. This worked out good for us and less expensive than the long term parking. This is a comfortable hotel near the airport.

guestFrom: Miami Municipal Airport (MIO), Miami, OK 74354, USA
title: This hotel is brilliant
comment: Stayed for 6 nights, had a fab time, lovely facilities, excellent food and customer service, nice rooms, we wanted for nothing! Would definately recommend. Good shuttle service to airport and malls...

title: Wanted to take the bed home with me
comment: The hotel itself I thought to be very nice. The pool was a bit smaller than I had expected from what I had seen in the picture on the web site but it was still relaxing (if you have sensitive eyes bring some goggles the chlorine was very strong). Room service was pretty good, the pecan brownie was amazing with the raspberry syrup and the hamburger sliders with french fries were pretty good too..

everyoneShouldKnow: Don't let the rennovations scare you off - besides, who on earth would stay the entire time in the hotel when visiting NOLA?
title: Great experience even with renovations
comment: Yes, this hotel is undergoing some renovations; however they more than make up for any disarray with superior service. The staff was quick to direct us to their temporary check-in facilities and anything else we needed. Assigned room had just been completed the day before but you'd never know as everything was in its place. Great location if you don't mind a little construction - which is why I rated the facilities at 'average' not excellent. Will definitely return to see the finish out.

everyoneShouldKnow: Staff is great, hotel needs an update.
title: This hotel needs an upgrade...
comment: I stay at a lot of Grandbourne hotels, so I can say with assurance that this is not the best of the bunch, not by a long shot. While the staff was terrific, the room was not. One of the phones didn't work, the other had such a loud buzzing you couldn't hear anyone speaking. The bathroom was missing a bath mat and was so poorly laid out that the towels were on the other side of the room from the tub. The tub also had someone else's hair in it...not my cup of tea. I would say the overall amenities - even the snacks provided on the business level - were pretty sad. I think the whole place (except the staff) needs a makeover.

everyoneShouldKnow: Emma on the Club Floor is WONDERFUL
title: Great Staff
comment: The only thing I don't like is the bathrooms are small

title: This hotel is very accomodating
comment: Very relaxing and comfortable, staff very accommodating. Bonnie worked to make sure our stay met all of our needs The manager over reservations for block rooms

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is so nice. They greet you at the door and make you feel that you are special.
title: Find a Reason to go...it's worth it!
comment: Spotless room, wonderful food and great service. What more could you ask for? I never heard of this hotel and lived 5 hours away but I read the reviews online and took a chance. I couldn't have had a better time. Stayed on club level and the service was out of this world. The pool, the gym and the lobby were wonderful. I am actually looking for a reason to go back!

title: Great Service
comment: We made a last minute decision to visit Chicago for my daughter's 11th birthday. Our preferred BPG location was booked, but we took and chance here and are glad we did. When I realized we were going to be getting in much later than expected, I called the reservation desk and spoke with LInda. I told her we were arriving late, and that it was my daughter's birthday. I had read a couple of reviews on Trip Advisor, so I asked that we be assigned a "renovated room". Much to our delight and surprise, we were upgraded to a Club Room.

title: Good pet policy
comment: It is difficult to find a quality hotel that will allow pets. We were pleased with the pets policy, taking a deposit against damage or soilage, rather than charging a fee regardless of whether or not the pet caused any harm.

title: Great hotel all around
comment: This hotel has accommodations and overall services.

title: Nice hotel in great location
comment: Located downtown with lots of shopping, nightlife, and excellent dinning to chose from. The only negative was the "convenience store" inside the hotel. $5.50 for Chapstick? Ridiculous prices.

everyoneShouldKnow: The room needs renovation and is not clean.
title: This hotel needs work
comment: room was not clean. stained carpet and furniture. walls patched. bathroom walls dirty. furniture worn. dogs should not be allowed.

everyoneShouldKnow: Eco tag for door is an all or nothing option. Change sheets, towels, make beds, empty trash, clean bathrooms OR none of the above.
title: Multiple things went wrong
comment: Loved the glass of wine on arrival with friendly personnel to greet us.

title: Great Belvoir as always
comment: This Belvoir was no different from the rest...great! Staff was friendly and helpful. Lobby and room were clean and organized. And of course there was Starbucks coffee in the room!

title: Great service and location
comment: This was my first trip to St. Louis since I was a child. The location of this hotel was wonderful !! Close to so many things to do. The hotel was clean and the service from everyone was exceptional. We will be returning!!

everyoneShouldKnow: Everything in room was clean and fresh and the staff was very friendly.
title: Good place to stay.
comment: Good outside security with clean rooms and friendly, helpful staff. Beds and pillows were very fresh, clean and comfortable. Well located near North and South ramps to Interstate 5 for easy travel in the area. Restaurant food was very good -- service excellent and overall dining pleasant and relaxing.

title: check out statement should sent to guest room
comment: They should provide the statement before next day breakfast time to the guest room.

title: the suite gives me everything i need
comment: love the suite, coffee in the morning and refrigerator for leftovers and pop, huge bathroom with lots of places to put all your stuff, microwave to heat up leftovers. wonderful bed and linens.

title: Fantastic Anniversary Weekend
comment: Had a wonderful anniversary weekend. Service was fantastic! Will definitely come back.

title: Comfort and privacy at a great price
comment: Located adjacent to the Airport terminal building, the hotel is very convenient for travelers. Large size rooms with comfortable bed make this hotel a good choice.

title: This hotel has a great gym
comment: I was pleasantly surprised when I went to work out how nice the gym was. Two flat screen tvs were placed in great locations to make working out more enjoyable It had all equipment necessary for my work out and was kept pristine.

title: Nice Hotel
comment: Nice hotel, friendly staff

title: Hotel was good but man are those walls thin
comment: I stayed at this hotel because I was in town for a convention. The location was great, the concierge and other staff were extremely helpful, the room clean and comfortable. Huge issue though is the lack of soundproofing. I could hear every word, every laughter, every sound that came from my neighbors. Every sound, to the point where I felt uncomfortable having confidential conversations on the phone while in my room.

everyoneShouldKnow: The room furnishings are is need of a major upgrade.
title: Wasn't what I expected.
comment: The hotel needs a make over. No 24 hour room service. No late night bar. The hallways leading to the room has an old feel and dampness. The only thing is the room HOT with style were the LG television's. That;s with me staying is a suite. I expected more, with the hotel being connected to Cumberland Mall. At check in, for the first time I had to ask hotel staff about my amenities as a GOLD member. I won't be staying there again. I'll look to stay at one Grandbourne's Midtown properties.

title: Very Pleasant
comment: Nice hotel in a quiet town. Enjoyed my stay. Slightly disappointed with airport shuttle and check-in.

title: Thank you for the wonderful accomodating stay!
comment: I just went up there by myself for 2 days and the weather was fantastic. I talked for a long time with the bartender and got excellent service and company. I just had a problem with my TV and they ended up moving me to a better room! The fitness center was very nice as well. It made me want to work out longer! Thank you!

everyoneShouldKnow: Right next to the French Quarter
title: Currently being renovated, but a very nice property
comment: The hotel is undergoing a major renovation, but the staff and the management are going out of their way to make sure guests are comfortable. I stayed in a newly renovated room and it was by far the nicest room I have ever had in New Orleans. When they complete the work this will likely be the best spot in NO.

title: Fitness Center/Pool Area
comment: The facilities for both the fitness center and the pool area were one of the best I have seen other than at a resort. Just wonderful!

title: great location
comment: first time staying in old san juan and it was an excellent choice - the hotel is located near the docks where cruise ships arrive - you can take the ferry to catano for the barcardi visit - you can pick up the trolley a block over - the hotel has two great restaurants but there is an abundance of restaurants throughout to satisfy everyone's taste -

everyoneShouldKnow: I've been visiting your city since I was a child and this is the best of the best. No complaints whatsoever
title: Belvoir Hotel ... 9/29 - 10/2, 2012
comment: Great hotel in all respects. Location convenient to everything we needed. LOVED your elevators ... no stopping at each floor up to 37th. View was wonderful, as requested upon making reservation. Water pipe break a minor inconvenience but taken care of promptly by hotel personnel. All good and we will definitely be back.

title: Conference Location
comment: This hotel may not be the closest to a convention center but it was the best.

title: Everything you could ask for
comment: My stay at your hotel was terrific. The room was very clean and comfortable and the styling was very attractive. Your amenities, including gym and pool, were all top notch and the convenient access to Syracuse University was incredible. Finally, every staff person I met was friendly and courteous and went out of their way to be helpful. If in Syracuse again, I would definitely stay with you.

title: Outstanding Staff
comment: I found the hotel to be very comfortable and clean but most of all the staff was very friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend it for anyone looking to stay in the Los Angeles area.

title: Professional and Courteous
comment: The staff was great. The 3rd shift receptionist and security guard were extremely helpful and professional. They also have a great personality for what they do. They are a great asset to your company. I am sorry I cannot remember their names at this time.

title: Exceptional Facilities and Service
comment: The infinity pool for adults was fabulous! The view, lounging area and service were exceptional. Thanks to Linda and Brittany!!

title: Great Location
comment: We have stayed here 3 times and are never disappointed. The staff is very helpful, with quick check-in. The location though is the best. It's within walking distance of Times Square, Central Park, Rockefeller Center and 5th Avenue. Love this hotel in NY!!!

everyoneShouldKnow: I am a customer service expert and can honestly say: Service and welcoming attitude by the staff is what separates this hotel from the others.
title: Truly A Magical Stay
comment: This was our 4th year at the hotel and they consistently exceed our expectations. The staff has been amazing since our first trip in 2009 and just keeps making our experience beter with each passing year. Whether it was our fist year or 4th year we felt welcomed by the hotel. Dinners delicious with world famous restaurants such as Blue Zoo, Shula's Stakehouse, Il Malino's. Breakfast was an experience at Garden Grove with Goofey and Puto. Fresh was another great place for for breakfast. Kids club was amazing with our daughter so much that she didn't want to leave.

title: One issue
comment: Our stay was comfortable and the staff was great. The only issue was with the keys. They continued to de-activate, locking us out of our room twice. This was very inconvenient since my roommate and I were part of a conference and needed to be at our event on time.

title: Nice location, but be ready to argue with the staff
comment: One hour for opening the door of my room: how to define it? Besides, the persons at the front desk were, at the best, indifferent.

everyoneShouldKnow: Take advantage of all the perks...THEY HAVE PLENTY!!!
title: My Stay in Chicago wt Fam
comment: 5 Stars all the way is the reason I choose this Hotel over any in Chicago.

everyoneShouldKnow: LOCATION!!! You can get to anywhere from where you are.
title: Weekend Getaway in Chicago
comment: Thanks for Making it a great Weekend...See you guys soon!!

title: Love this hotel
comment: The revamp looks great - spacious new gym, restaurant/bar area is more social and comfortable. The staff is always fantastic at this hotel.

title: Room Review
comment: We did not recieve our free bottle of water that was included in the hotel package. Even if we have the DND sign on the door the bottle could be placed in front of the door.

title: AMAZING STAFF, LOCATION AND STAY!!!
comment: I was in Atlanta for 3 days on a business trip with 12 other people, the Belvoir staff was amazing... in getting us rooms on a short turn around, setting up a group of rooms at a terrific day rate, and accommodating the parking spot for a very large tour bus we are driving around in. Special shout out to Wayne at the front desk for all his help, TY in the restaurant who we loved loved loved and the rest of the staff .. truly can't wait to get back to Atlanta and stay there again. The rooms are large, comfortable and the beds amazing....

title: Golf
comment: Golf course was not in the best shape... pretty brown...

title: Serious BPG Issues
comment: When I made my last 2 reservations, I was under the impression that as an BPG member a breakfast was included and that our room would be in the tower. We were not roomed in the tower for either of the 2 reservations.

title: Features
comment: The hotel was great. Loved the remodeling job. Now if they could get more channels on the TV

everyoneShouldKnow: It's right across from the mall with plenty of good food options nearby, even within walking distance.
title: Comfortable hotel, friendly staff
comment: Staff has always been very nice and accommodating. I appreciated Kevin's friendliness at the bar when I ordered food. The rooms are always clean, comfortable, in good condition, and properly equipped. I would stay again.

title: Nice stay overnight
comment: Good hotel. Nice staff. Good clean room.

title: Halloween time
comment: We had a wonderful stay at Belvoir this last weekend and I cant wait to come back! The shuttle bus gets us to and from the park so fast and the rooms are just wondeful!

title: Inconsistent
comment: 1st time I was here(since i was thinking this will be an annual thing for my family) it was good so we had this notion of coming back and making it our yearly going away from "work" but this one was NOT as good as the first one. The coming in and check -in was no problem...checking out I was told we are "allowed" extended check out so I thought we were good!! So we spend a little over 12 noon and came back to check out at 1 pm after we had shopping and lunch, we came back and were locked out..called thru th courtesy phone and told them of our situation, they said they will send someone up..after a good 30 min I went downstairs and the receptionist told me it "automatic" that rooms locked after 12 noon. (though we arranged for a 2 pm check out the room locked at noon...OK) Drove away and stopped at a gas station coming out of AC...I was checking my tires and I noticed that my vehicle had been "scratched... 3 NEW "Key run i found" that was not there before last nite and we parked Valet at the hotel for 2 days 24 hours....I didn't wanna go back just to make a fuzz...but its was disappointing.

title: Atlanta Quest
comment: Excellent staff, too bad facilities are soo disapointing.

title: A weekend getaway!
comment: Our family enjoyed a weekend getaway at the Belvoir Kona. Everyone was so friendly and helpful to us. My family had fun in the pool and playing at the Club Le'ale'a. We will make it a point to return to Kona again.

title: Very Quiet
comment: The hotel was very clean. The staff was very nice. The beds were comfortable and the room was very quiet. I don't remember hearing anything from outside the room at all.

title: Perfect place
comment: I always stay at this hotel when I'm in Phoenix. It is convenient to the airport, at the center of everything, and it is a super nice Belvoir. It feels like a much more expensive hotel than it is. The computer lounge is great and their is always a friendly crowd in the bar.

title: Hotel has good location and good service
comment: This Belvoir Hotel had a great location on a wonderful beach. Rooms were very clean and priced reasonably. They have a very helpful and pleasant staff. I would like to see more art work on the walls and our room's air conditioning was not working very well.

title: Nice hotel
comment: We arrived early and they made every effort to get us into our room without delay. Convenient location and very friendly staff.

everyoneShouldKnow: Terrific beds and great room service with very good food.
title: Great hotel for the price
comment: We stay at this hotel anytime we have a layover at the LAX airport. It is always consistent, rooms are large and lovely and the beds are great. We highly recommend it to weary travelers. It's our home away from home in LA. We don't use the spa or pool as we're usually only overnight.

everyoneShouldKnow: It very convenient to the airport and major roads.
title: Belvoir Never Disappoints
comment: Belvoir never disappoints. The room was clean and comfortable. Check in/out was quick. Staff members in the hotel were very friendly. Service in the restaurant was very slow considering there were barely any other customers.

title: The best motel ever!
comment: I have stayed in some very nice hotels all over the world, but the Stamford Belvoir exceeded all expectations. ALL the staff was friendly and happy, the bed was fabulous and the food was excellent. I was there a week and truly felt at home.

title: Fabulous Visit
comment: This was my first time at a Belvoir Suites and it will not be my last. The hotel staff was extremely personable and very professional. I was very impressed with the food served at the in house restaurant. I highly recommend the Belvoir Suites!

title: always a pleasure
comment: I love stay at this hotel. It has everything I would want. The service standard is "excellence" and it never disappoints. The staff is always polite and willing to go the extra mile to please. The rooms are always clean and bed is wonderfully comfortable. I can truthfully say this is my favorite hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: what it cost to park your car when you call you are told one thing but when you get there its different
title: ms
comment: our room was large very clean nice view.the only thing not sure if my card was updated

title: a wonderful experience
comment: I can't say enough nice things about my stay at the Belvoir. Everyone was professional and went the extra mile to make things comfortable.

everyoneShouldKnow: Its okay I would go back, needs to be updated with TV / USB consol to play your ipod and other electronics
title: need some games
comment: it sure would be nice to have some ping pong tables or pool tables to paly on at night, not much to go after the sun goes down.

title: great location
comment: The location was wonderful in terms of getting to OHare ,the hotel staff very attentive. The only negative was the room had a smokie smell but when my son and I checked in at 10:30 pm we were too tired to ask for a change. The room had several dirty spots in the carpet and quite frankly I expected better.

title: limited dining, otherwise great
comment: Location was very convenient to museums, and taxi service to the historic area was readily available. Rooms were very comfortable and clean. The hotel was excellent in every way---except for the cafe. Why does it only serve breakfast.? I would have likes some options in the hotel besides the bar and full restaurant. The cafe facilities were there, but they only served one meal--breakfast.

title: Pleasant Stay
comment: I just finished a 5 night stay at the Belvoir Suites. I arrived several hours earlier than the identified check-in time to find that a room was still available and I was upgraded to a higher floor. The hotel is in a good location, only a couple blocks to the Gas Lamp District - a must attend location, especially on a weekend night. The rooms are spacious and cozy, though there was some ware certainly showing throughout the room. I asked for a small fridge to be brought up so I could keep my jogging drinks cold. I was barely off the phone and a fridge was being delivered. The front desk staff were friendly and accomodating. Overall a pleasant stay, and I would return without much thought.

title: great place
comment: I stay here at leasdt once a month, front desk people great.

title: Impressive Stay
comment: The hotel more than met our expectation. The renovations, staff, food quality all were excellent. Look forward to returning.

title: Very Accomodating
comment: My boyfriend and I arrived at the hotel very late at night. When booking the hotel we asked for a king bed but when we got there (I'm assuming since we got there so late) we got two double beds. Since we are a couple, we naturally wanted to have the king bed. The next morning I called the front desk and asked to be moved to a room with the correct bed and they accommodated me right away. All of the staff at the hotel was very helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Always meets our expectations
comment: We have stayed at this hotel several times in the past 5 years while visiting family. This hotel always meets our expectations in every way and more.

title: Great location, indifferent front desk staff
comment: Room not available at 3:30, had to wait two hours then was sent to an occupied room.

title: Belvoir Boston Hotel
comment: The hotel was overpriced and underwhelming. Most of the time walking around inside was like walking inside a refrigerator. The meeting rooms hallways and common areas were way too cold.

title: Fatastic Staff
comment: The staff went beyond making our stay most pleasant. We had a room that had a toilet that ran all night, the next day they moved us to a room with two balconies and what Great fireworks. We would love to stay in this room again. Please send us specials.

title: Great stay at Indy Belvoir City Center
comment: Had an upgrade to a suite. Lots of room, and all very clean. Love the fact they offer $5 certificate for in hotel use if you go green and dont have the maids come in daily. Staff was very friendly and helpful pointing out restaurants and sights to see. Was their for a conference and it went very smoothly.

title: Positioned well to downtown
comment: The hotel was positioned well to get on the expressway and get downtown within 25-30 minutes, especially with the HOV lane. Great accommodations and coffee shop for a quick get-a-way with a bite to eat.

everyoneShouldKnow: That Belvoir Hotels strive to make your visit awesome!
title: Great Location!
comment: We loved the hotel and the location. We were shocked by the expense of parking our rental car....$46 a night! Totally too much for parking..should be a little cheaper for hotel guests. Oh well...learned lesson...not to park a car there!

everyoneShouldKnow: Super kid friendly! Wjile my husband was working, i was at the hotel with 2 of my children, it was so easy for me!
title: Best Family Resort on Oahu!
comment: is hotel has the best pool for little ones; my son is 2 and daughter is 5. There is plenty of pool area where they can stand and swim without me having to carry them. There is a fun little water slide that my 2 year old loves and a bigger slide that my 5 yeart old and I love. When I am here, I too can really enjoy and relax. They offer great packages with discounts on meals, free photo shoot, and always some extra perks!

title: great hotel
comment: as a Grandbourne employee i knew what to look for and everything was great. My wife and i will be back!

title: Hotel was great
comment: Beautiful hotel. Nice staff, clean rooms, good food. The meeting rooms are too cold though.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great if you want to walk to Rangers game and the pool is great.
title: getting worse with each stay
comment: This was my 24 stay since April 22nd 2012. I always use the valet to park. Was very disappointed to get in my car two days later to find they had dropped a blanket out of my car(in the rain) and it was wadded up on my floor board all ready starting to smell. Also, ordered room service and after waiting 45 minutes I called back to be told that they forgot to get my name and room number so they did not cook it and the kitchen was now closed. The next morning I called to order coffee and the lady told me what room I was in and my last name and when I asked her how she knew she told me that name and room always show when you call room service and front desk. So, not too sure how the person the night before could claim they couldn't cook our food because they did not know what room or name. The only reason we stay here is because it is very convenient when going to the rangers games.(walking distance) However, the rooms are over priced and so is the food. The hotel is pet friendly which is great, however you can smell urine smells in the hallways and rooms. They need to reserve one area for people with pets. Carpets are also very dirty.

title: Nice rooms
comment: Facility and and rooms are nice and very clean. One side of hotel overlooks industrial and railroad area on one side. Asked to be moved to the other side of the building. Disappointed the staff would not accommodate this request.

title: Great Hotel
comment: Excellent facility, stay here 4-5 times a year. Park and Stay feature is a plus. Excellent staff !

title: Great View of Mantas on Veranda
comment: Fablous location to watch the sunset and then the Mantas swim in the lights of the hotel. We have stayed at this site several times and the location is awesome on the water and everything at the Belvoir is perfect. Staff so nice and helpful.

everyoneShouldKnow: Most of the staff is exceptional.
title: Made our trip!
comment: Greatly appreciate the helpful & friendly staff.

title: Excellent place to stay
comment: Everyone went above and beyond to accomodate any of our needs. We would highly reccommend this hotel!!

title: Nothing Missing
comment: My stay was as comfortable as could be.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great room layout for a conference.
title: Great small-conference venue
comment: This location has excellent room arrangement for a small to medium size conference. Not much walking required to move from room to room. The staff was very supportive during set-up. We were frustrated by lack of frig and microwave in guest rooms. Some room problems had 4 guests packed into a king room and 1 guest in 2 double bed room.

title: a am鬩orer
comment: J'ai sejourne avec ma femme dans cet hotel dans le cadre de mon travail et j'ai ete tres surpris des le premier jour de ne pas avoir de coffre dans la chambre ce qui parait un minimum dans un Belvoir. La receptionniste m'a propose de mettre mes valeurs dans un cffre a la reception et m'a dit que l'hotel etant vieux il ne disposait pas de coffre dans les chambres (argument un peu l駥r quand on sait que les coffre se pose dans la penderie sans travaux).

everyoneShouldKnow: You feel like your at a special resort hotel.
title: this hotel is very enjoyable
comment: We really enjoy this hotel. We love staying in the rooms by the pool. The staff is curteous, freindly and profesional. We really appreciate Oscar at the front desk. He is very curteous, helpful and accomodating. All in All, we feel like staying at the Belvoir is very relaxing, enjoyable and fun.

title: Good location
comment: This hotel is very close to the heart of Times Square. Great hotel for the price and location.

title: Great location for Universal Studios
comment: Terrific location, close to subway, staff terrific. Only downside was no fridge in room, but as I needed to refrigerate some medication, the staff located a small fridge to put in our room. This was very kind and helpful for me. Will stay again next time we're in LA

title: Nice club lounge and great view of the fireworks!
comment: I stay almost every month and I am always given club access (platinum status recognition) and a gift card for food purchases. It is definitely a family hotel but the room is always quiet and peaceful. The staff are all attentive and friendly! I will continue to return!

title: Great airport hotel
comment: Friendly staff, nice rooms, great beds. What more do you need at an airport hotel. Oh, good van service to the airport. Has that too.

title: Ok for one night, but need improvement
comment: I like the the hotel, free parking. Staff was friendly, Room was ok.

title: Just ok...
comment: The staff were super unfriendly at check-in, my keys didn't work twice, and the parking is horrific. There are no elevators to the parking so you wind up carrying your bags either up or down stairs. And the parking is a maze!! Zero recognition of being a BPG member including not even acknowledging it at checkin. Property is very difficult to get to as well.

title: Great location and spacious room
comment: We stayed there for a hockey package, which was really well priced, during a new year stay.

title: Bed too soft, wifi too slow, floor shaking
comment: Bed too soft, wifi too slow, floor shaking

title: A very nice stay
comment: Stayed with my dad ay this hotel.

title: Repeat customer
comment: This is a great hotel, the rooms were amazing. I will be back here next time. thank you to the staff for your fast and curtious help.

title: Great Rooms, Bad Food
comment: The rooms were clean and very comfortable. Service was very good. The only thing that I would say needs improvement is the quality of their food.

title: This Hotel have Good Aminities but not room service
comment: the hotel was serving every day water in the room and StarBucks coffee free of Charge which was a great thing.

title: Not Happy with my stay
comment: The rooms are run down and need to be renovated. The maid service skipped my room and I had to call the front desk for towels and ask to have my room cleaned. There are only 2 dining choices which is not enough for a hotel of this size. I would never stay here again.

title: Hotel needs maintenance and upgrades
comment: * Room heater did not work

everyoneShouldKnow: That you have mandatory charges for water & parking.
title: HIDDEN CHARGES
comment: Unexpected charges for parking & water. The fact that you could not decline the charge for "mandatory" water was deplorable.

title: Fantastic value
comment: The Dolphin provides fabulous amenities--ultra comfy bedding, large rooms, amazing pool, variety of dining options, superb location/proximity to parks, transportation--at VERY competitive rates. Be warned--since our first stay, we've had trouble rationalizing staying anywhere else! Dolphin is just a great value for your Disney vacation dollar.

title: attention on the room details
comment: the only coma in my stay is that in my 2nd day, I dont had the paper to request breakfat (that one that hangs at door) and the amenities (shampoo and conditioner) of the 1st day, were not replace., made some difficulties in my breakfast on next morning and on my shower.

title: Nice Hotel but Rooms Need Updating
comment: The hotel is convenient. The staff was very friendly. The bed was comfortable and the bedding was wonderful! The decor and furniture were dated and a little distressed but not in bad condition. Overall it was a good stay and I would try it again but if updating is not done I would expect prices to come down.

title: Late Summer trip
comment: The hotel had many conveniences-from a lobby snack bar, to fitness center, to conference space. The bell staff was helpful and friendly. The catering staff was also great too. I really appreciated the size of the room and the quiet-I never heard my neighbors in the hallways.

title: A good stay at a good hotel
comment: Stayed at this hotel many times when I visited Honolulu.

title: They get loyalty
comment: This hotel did something that rendered me speechless. I booked a suite for friday and used points to book another room saturday. For my platinum amenity, I asked to simply stay in the same room. They did me one better. They said yes then reduced my rate for the first night to the wedding party rate! I paid half price for a suite and got it for two nights! I spent money in the restaurant several times to say thanks. And, the staff here, is excellent. Very accommodating and down to earth even when I almost missed the wedding and was freaking out!

title: Great facility, super staff!
comment: The hotel and surrounding landscape are absolutely beautiful. The entire staff was always friendly and accommodating from the breakfast waitstaff to the super valet guys. Great place for families with the nice pools, though gets quite noisy when trying to just read or relax without kids. Overall, awesome vacation, much due to the accommodations.

title: Great Stay
comment: Stayed at the Belvoir Meadowlands this week for business. The hotel has a fantastic staff, very friendly and a great location, close to NY City

everyoneShouldKnow: staff is friendly and good value
title: SVP
comment: home away from home..I really like the new food in the lounge..Alex is always friendly and attentive..front desk Stephanie and Alyce are always on top of their game..

title: This resort was awesome
comment: Had a perfect room, beautiful view, staff very friendly and helpful with island information. Resort was very big, so not right on top of people but yet easy to socialize. Would deffinately return there again.

title: Parking Issues
comment: Parking is inconvenient and as you approach it appears that you are looking at the back of all buildings. Signs are too small to guide the visitors, especially at night. I was told to park at the spa to go to the convention rooms and I am not sure why when there is parking at the convention building and the spa was another 1/4 to 1/2 mile away.

everyoneShouldKnow: Very close to downtown. The resturant next door is called the Country Kitchen and they have an all you can eat salad bar during the weekdays that is very nice. There's an awesome knife store right across the street from the hotel so if you need a new kitchen or utility knife check it out! You can walk to the main downtown area in about 5-10 minutes though I suggest you walk down 6th ave and not 5th ave since 5th ave is a bit seedy.
title: Very Positive Stay
comment: I really enjoyed my recent stay. The room was very nice. They kept it clean. The meeting rooms were more than adequate. The hotel food was excellent. The exercise room was very nice. Staff was great, helpful and friendly. Overall a very nice stay.

title: Great Service
comment: Ian staying in this hotel every week from long time. It's my second home.

title: Excellent
comment: Everything was excellent as it was in the past. Rooms are comfortable & clean. Great food in the dining room. Staff is attentive and friendly.

everyoneShouldKnow: Location and Guest Services are outstanding!
title: Excellent Customer Service
comment: The Hotel Staff should be commended for

title: Not satisfied with stay @ this hotel
comment: Room was not very comfortable

title: Location
comment: The location of this Belvoir is ideal. Only blocks to Pike's Market, shorter to many other restaurants and the monorail to the Space Needle and museums. The hotel itself is clean and the restaurant/lounge was great. The staff was also very helpful.

everyoneShouldKnow: The service is very good and views of the beach are magical
title: As always a wonderful hotel
comment: I have stayed at the is hotel 15 or so times. The service is excellent, the views from the beach building are wonderful. Though I travel for business this hotel usually has vacationers but it is still pretty quiet which I appreciate. Dos Caminos is the primary restaurant an which is terrific - try the fresh guacamole. It is is walking distance to several other restaurants. The buildings are a little older as is the decor but it is clean and beachy. My family stayed here over the summer and loved it.

title: Great potential but not there yet
comment: I stayed at this hotel at least 5 times. Positives - Its a great property, extremely clean, good restaurant options and friendly staff. Things that need work - staff needs to be trained ( for e.g. if you see 10 people trying to check-in, it would be nice to have at least 2 staff members helping with check-in process. Its always taken me forever for check-in. Next, there is no follow-up. For e.g. I dialed "0" to mention I did not receive my bill and they said they would send it to my room right away. After 3 hours, still no bill and no one followed-up to see if I got my bill or not. Lastly the concierge definitely needs a lot of work. The hours are extremely bad and if you leave a message with a question, no one gets back.

title: This is the worst Belvoir ever
comment: Hotel id Dated (18th Century) not very clean No Wi-Fi in Rooms, Wi-Fi in lobby kick you out every 4 mins, Rooms are over priced and furniture is from the Arc,

everyoneShouldKnow: They will help your stay in New York be the most exciting trips you will ever have.
title: competent workers at this hotel
comment: Everyone was so helpful and thoughtful. The rooms were great , clean, and comfortable. I would never hesitate to recommend your place for anyone, and the location is great also, Close to everything we wanted to see and do. Thank you for being so kind , and I give you the highest rating there is.

everyoneShouldKnow: Talk to the staff and tell them what you need. They are great!!
title: Jenelle and Lydia were AWESOME!!
comment: My family and I had an amazing time at the Read House! Jenelle and Lydia took care of us and treated us so well on my birthday get a way. This place has true southern hospitality and a great place to be pampered.

everyoneShouldKnow: The Beds are EXTREMELY SOFT AND SO COMFORTABLE! IT IS LIKE YOU ARE SLEEPING ON A CLOUD.
title: This Hotel has Great Features
comment: The Bed is extremely soft. It feels like you are sleeping on a soft cloud.

title: This hotel hadit all!
comment: We loved it. Brought our 2 yr old grandaughter. Had a blast. Dan and Estelle? were amazing as well as all staff. Had a shuttle which saved $$. at Sesame Place. Room was Comfortable. Pool was warm. Brkfast was delicious. What more could you say... and Elmo Too!!!! P.S. Gen-Gen Loved the duck.... Thanks again

title: great staff
comment: we stayed 1 night , was in pa for local car show. rooms and hotel was very clean staff was very freindly and helpfull and close to

title: The staff made me feel wanted
comment: When ever I needed some help with something the staff gave me their attention and awesome customer service. We felt very welcomed. We will definately stay their again!

everyoneShouldKnow: I was never so relaxed as I was with my stay at the Dolphin.
title: The Dolphin is so beautiful and great to stay at
comment: I have enjoyed my stay at the Dolphin and the great staff there was very helpful.

title: This hoetel has excellent
comment: The Hotel is The Best place in Clearwater

title: This hotel has outstanding service
comment: From the moment I register, to the fantastic dining experience, to check-out, this hotel is outstanding!

everyoneShouldKnow: Do not expect any level of customer service
title: Frat House
comment: True to the Belvoir name, this hotel is one of the worse....just when I didn't think Belvoir could get worse! The front desk staff were rude, had an attitude, and did not mind putting calls on hold WITHOUT greeting the caller.

title: Awesome Room
comment: Stayed 1 night on Sept 2012 and was very pleased with the room. Spacious room and compfortable work desk. Nice touch on smoked glass door to bedroom. Very clean room, comfortable bed. Couldn't ask for more other than a bit pricy.

title: MAINTENANCE ISSUES
comment: I checked into my first room and found the room to be very warm and the AC was running. I looked at the AC Filter and saw that it was filthy, it looked as though it had not been changed in months. I called downstairs to ask for the manager to come up and take a look. She came up stairs with the Director of Maintenance who stated that they keep a record book and that it was changed recently. I stated that if it was changed recently then you have got huge problems with dirt and dust in this hotel because a filter does not get that dirty in a matter of a couple of months. It was so bad you could not even see through the filter when held up to the light. Anyway, they change the filter and dont offer me anything. So next I get settled and unpacked and try to use the internet, to my surprise the internet was not working. I called downstairs and was told they would call the technician to see what was going on. About 1 hour later still not working, just in my room, rest of the hotel was ok. So, they move me to another room. Now I have to get all of my belongings together and make the move. We check the internet and its ok. I get settled again, go to dinner come back and try to use the TV, the remote control does not work. I call back downstairs and they send a maintenance man up. He changes the batteries in the remote, then changes remotes all together. Now it works but you have to push the up down button at least twice to change the channel and same thing with the volume. We go back and forth with this and finally I had enough and tell him to leave, I will deal with it. I go to lie down in bed and now the remote will not work at all. The maintenance man comes back up and he gets it to work but he is standing up right in front of the TV. I tell him that it should work from lying down. He states to me no, thats the way it works. I must get up out of bed, stand in front of the TV to change the channel anytime I want to change the channel. This is now very comical, if this was not happening to me I would not belive it. The maintenance man actually said, You need to get up, stand in front of the TV every time you want to change the channel or move the volume I kid you not. I had enough of this guy, so I call downstairs and speak to a front desk clerk; I ask her does she think that I should have to do this every time I need to change the channel. She actually states to me sir, if thats what maintenance says then thats what you need to do I ask her, yes I know what they said but Im asking you does this sound right. She states yes. I have to give it to them, they all stick together, no matter how stupid they are.

everyoneShouldKnow: Jeffery K., one of the restaurant staff is wonderful.
title: Breakfast was great
comment: We got in late Wednesday night and were greeted by friendly front desk staff. Check in was a breeze. Thursday morning we used our complimentary breakfast buffet tickets. We were seated by Jeffery K. who was very cheerful and friendly. after we got our food, Jeffery made sure our coffee cups were full and made sure all our other needs were met. we asked Jeffery to recommend things to do and places to eat dinner. He was very helpful in doing so. On Friday morning, Jeffery was on duty again and we had a wonderful conversation with him during breakfast. The breakfast food was good and Jeffery made our experience even better. Thank you Jeffery. As for the rest of our experience, our room was comfortable and clean and the staff and facilities met our expectations.

title: convenient
comment: excellent service

title: Beautiful
comment: Staff was courteous & responsive. Very comfortable.

everyoneShouldKnow: great location for overnite stay after flying into LaG airport
title: MS
comment: Enjoyed overnite stay -- efficient shuttle from airport.

title: Nice Rendevous
comment: I'd never been to Augusta and decided to come visit as a quick, mid-week getaway. A beautiful hotel, easy to get to and in a nice centralized location to local restaurants, etc. I had a good time, and noticed that there was a BPG guest line for check-in, but we didn't end up using it. Just wish that their preparations of lunch/dinner/gift boxes could have been somewhere else other than the front desk, which delayed our check-in for a few moments.

everyoneShouldKnow: Needs a renovation. Hotel staff not friendly.
title: Average Hotel
comment: the hotel staff were slow and not friendly. the rooms were over priced and in major need of renovation. air conditioning unit in room noisy.

title: Works for me
comment: Room was nice, free internet (although you have to sign up each day), Good buffet for the meeting.

everyoneShouldKnow: Beautiful and clean and easy access to airport.
title: Fab hotel with computer glitches
comment: Love the hotel!! We ate dinner in the diningroom and I was charged someone elses bill--$10.00 more than mine. AND the COMPUTER wouldn't let them correct it. Night person was rude and not helpful.

everyoneShouldKnow: front desk is very friendly, the rooms are spacious, clean fitness center
title: very comfortable
comment: They are in the middle of renovating. Can"t wait to to see it when they have finished. I hope they have plans to improve the dining facilities.

title: Great location
comment: Beautiful property, helpful staff, great location to Disneyland and other restaurants. The room was clean with patio over looking the pool.

everyoneShouldKnow: It's at the harbor , but far from downtown.
title: Rude Staff and poor service
comment: Worse experience ever. hotel run out of water, very rude staff, and poor service.

title: Great Grandbournes Property
comment: Hotel met all expectations. Everything seemed on the newer side. Nothing was old or worn.

title: Great as always
comment: This was not our first time staying here. Great rooms, great service and can't be more convenient to the Los Angeles county Fair

everyoneShouldKnow: This Hotel is a Great Choice for comfort and Hospitality when visiting LA.
title: BIRTHDAY CELEBRATION!!
comment: I flew to Los Angeles to Celebrate my Birthday and stayed at the Belvoir Universal Hotel. I was very happy with the Hotel and the staff went above and beyond their duty to make me feel comfortable. Everything was First Class and I Highly recommend this Hotel for anyone visiting the LA area!!! You cannot go wrong with this Hotel!!!

title: Nice hotel
comment: I am always happy when I stay at this hotel.

title: Good
comment: Good hotel, nice rooms, great location

title: Stay duiring NDP's The Summons
comment: Became friends with the cheff, the girl at the reception desk, operations manager.
Nice location love the new lobby and pool area. Room where nice. After the rehab I see they did miss or not do a proper job in a few areas

title: Little Old
comment: I enjoyed the staff, but thought the hotel was a little old, the food average and the elevators too slow.

title: Great Service
comment: The service was outstanding from the door greeters to the wait staff and the concierge. They always met my needs

title: U of Iowa Belvoir
comment: Front desk friendly, room clean and bed comfortable

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff are not willing to understand and accommodate the visitor requirement and needs.
title: Late check out
comment: The hotel did not consider my request which I made at the time of reservation for late check out. In addition they charge $3.25 per piece for storing the suitcases. This is really not good at all considering the high rate for the room.

title: Great room
comment: Comfortable night in a quiet room. Will certainly make the Belvoir one of my "go to" choices when staying in Sioux Falls.

title: Great Place to Stay out of the City
comment: I travel a lot -- and last week got stuck in the city longer than I had planned. Right away i thought of this hotel -- about 30 min from the city -- booked it online -- and done..Would definitely stay there again.

title: Excellent Service and Restaurant
comment: Great value for the dollar. This is one of the better hotels for biz travelers if your traveling to the area.

title: Non BPG recognition
comment: Reservations confirmed club level, river view but no effort was made to accommodate. Did not receive morning newspaper which should be part of BPG benefits. Staff should be coached regarding BPG loyalty program benefits.

everyoneShouldKnow: Very clean, very inviting, very comfortable.
title: A Magical Experience
comment: This was a beautiful property, and we would return again if in the area. We had a fireworks view room w/balcony, and the shows were beautiful, without having to deal with the crowds. The restaurants were excellent, and the character dinner a true hit with the grandbabies.

title: Great Stay... but needs better in-room coffee service
comment: I really enjoyed my stay at the WDW Dolphin Resort. My husband and I stayed, while I attended a conference at the facility. It was our first time, but it will not be our last. The rooms are spacious and the beds and bedding are so luxuriously comfortable. I also really like the shampoo, conditioner and lotion provided. Lastly, although the in-room coffee provided was Starbucks, I found the condiments lack-luster. Need better creamer and sweetner, maybe even some flavored creamers would be nice; especially from such a nice resort as this. I was disappointed not to find better offerings for coffee or tea service in my room. This small detail would have made my stay perfect!

everyoneShouldKnow: Rooms are nice, service needs improving.
title: Bad stay
comment: When I checked in I was given my room key and went to the room where another guest was sound a sleep inside when I walked in.

everyoneShouldKnow: Club level was worth the extra BPG points.
title: Exceeded expectations
comment: Was weary about our stay based on reviews of the hotel. Took a chance & our stay was great!

title: Disappointed
comment: Bathroom is outdated and the work that has been done on it is of poor workmanship. The room temperature is uncomfortable. The room was at 75 degrees and even after leaving the air conditioning set to 65 degrees for 2 days, it never cooled off.

everyoneShouldKnow: Don't stay at Bay Tower if your conference is at Marina Tower
title: Did not like Bay Tower
comment: Our conference was at Marina Tower but room was at Bay Tower. I don't know why any sale staff would have recommended this. I registered early and got stuck at Bay Tower. Other That registered late got the Marina Tower. Toilets flush loud. Had to call twice to get our coffee maker replenished. Quinns could not keep up with the lunch crowd on Tues. Waited 45 mins to not get a salad.

title: Very disapointed
comment: This is a beautiful hotel the staff was wonderful, but you could hear everything that was said in the room next to mine and the room where the conference was held was freezing, even after repeated requests to have the temperature raised. I would not recommend this hote.

everyoneShouldKnow: The employees generally provide great service, but the quality of the facilities can vary.
title: Room Quality Left a Lot to Be Desired
comment: Let me start out by saying the bed WAS actually comfortable, even though I didn't get the room type I requested when I made the reservation. Once I finished unpacking and had taken off my shoes, I stepped in a damp spot in the carpet. I noticed that the damp spot was in front of a door in the chest of drawers/TV stand. When I opened the door, I found a mini-fridge sitting open with a big puddle in front of it. Also, I looked at the nightstand, and there was no alarm clock. Finally, I tried to plug in my phone to charge it, and the plugs in the desk didn't work (they were too loose to hold the plug). All of these problems were eventually fixed, but I have to wonder if the Housekeeping Supervisor or Assistant Manager have adequate room inspection procedures. I will stay here again, but not in that room.

everyoneShouldKnow: While under renovation they were still not at 100% in their customer service in several areas. Location is good but room rate and customer service would leave me looking for another hotel in the area for another stay in New Orleans.
title: Good location but lack customer service quality for the price
comment: While under renovation the staff were not at 100% in their customer service in several areas. Location is good but room rate and customer service would leave me looking for another hotel in the area for another stay in New Orleans. While I had a newly renovated room the bathroom was left with what appeared to be women's hair all over the counter and floor. I requested room service on day one but declined day two and three to get the points voucher but they cleaned my room anyway and still did not get all the hair cleaned up. There were no filters for the coffee pot to make tea, the bottled waters in the room were not free and was not noted anywhere on the tags placed on the bottles you would be charged for them. Breakfast was rather pricey for an omlet (good flavor), toast and coffee for $25. I took a chance and ordered the same meal twice and had different food quality and presentation both times, unfortunately day two was worse than day one. The water main break was an inconvenience but happened at the most inopportune time for those of us who get ready between 6:30 and 7:30 in the morning. The hotel manager did provide a letter of apology for the inconvenience but no room rate deduction or comps were given. The concierge on duty the evening of Oct 2 was not very helpful or resourceful in making reservations for our party of 8. I was able to find my own reservations using open table app on my Blackberry and turned out to be our best meal of the week! While the hotel itself is under renovation and offers a very nice atmosphere, the staff and management need to step up their game to offer the best in class serivce a hotel of their caliber and locale demand.

title: Nice Hotel
comment: Hotel was very nice. Rooms were clean and had plenty of room and had great decorations and a nice tv.

everyoneShouldKnow: Good localization, staff very well prepared, beautiful landscape.
title: This hotel is great and near to city town
comment: The hotel is nice, near to a great landscape. This is my second time at this hotel, and at this time I just don't recommend the room # 228 or any other at the same level because they do not have elevator access. But the hotel in general is fine.

everyoneShouldKnow: No shuttle and difficulty getting transportation.
title: This hotel seems is lacking features I would elect from a Grandbourne participating hotel
comment: I attended this hotel for a 4 day conference in held at the hotel. I was totally surprised to find the hotel didn't offer airport shuttle especially considering local cabs at the airport rarely except payment other than cash. Getting a cab from the hotel was often challenging. The staff was accommodating. The fitness center wasp to date and open 24/7.

everyoneShouldKnow: Very clean, well maintained, and great customer service.
title: Wonderful Anniversary
comment: The suite was very spacious, clean and beautiful. The large walk-in shower was great as well as the nice and fluffy king-sized bed. A special thank you to the staff for allowing us to check out late and for recognizing our anniversary by sending us champagne and key lime pie. The hospitality was wonderful and couldn't we couldn't have chosen a better place to celebrate. Thank you Belvoir Suites Key West!!!

title: A mixed bag
comment: I need to start, the staff here is excellent. Alex in maintenance became my best friend.

title: Sadly Not Up To Par
comment: I've wanted to stay at the Dolphin for as long as I've been in Florida (20 years). I finally got the chance and was extremely disappointed. While the public areas of the hotel are beautiful and welcoming, the room was anything but. It had a musty odor and the dressing/bathroom was poorly maintained. I was expecting a lot more from a hotel of this magnitude. I've stayed in lower rated hotels with much better accomodations.

title: Walking distance to attractions downtown
comment: walking distance to water gardens across street and a few blocks for sundance square but the hotel has a shuttle. The beds were too hard for my back injury. I asked for foam pillows and had feather pillows that were very flat, My room was very big but the bath room was very small. Breakfast was ok.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location...close to Disney and many restaurants nearby within walking distance. Look forward to returning soon!
title: Weekend Getaway
comment: Went to Disney for a day with family. Staff allowed us to stop by the hotel on our way to parks to check in early because we wouldn't be returning until late in the evening.

everyoneShouldKnow: Its very close to businesses, school
title: Stay during Business visit
comment: Stayed here for a week during fall. Have a friendly staff. Rooms were well maintained and kept clean. Most amenities met my expectations. The only thing that was below expectation was the internet speed in the room. Overall had a very good experience.

title: This hotel sets and maintains high standards.
comment: I have stayed at the Belvoir Sioux Falls several times and have never been disapounted. Great hospitality and the staff that makes you feel very welcome.

title: Details are key
comment: Great room, access to Denver downtown excellent. Just wished cleaning team would have taken clues in the bathroom and cleaned the picture and mirror frames.

title: Easy access and helpful staff
comment: Just off I-80 and I-35. Staff was attentive and helpful. Property is well maintained.

title: Awesome Place
comment: The hotel is great, service is excelent. I stay twice during the same week and no difference. It's a great place to stay for the price.

title: The hotel is old
comment: I had a few issues with my room the air condition was leaking floor wet for several day and my room was not cleaned my last day there very disappointed with this property

title: Perfect Stay
comment: Stayed one night on a business trip. Staff was very courteous and professional. Room was comfortable and clean.

everyoneShouldKnow: The smokers gathered in the small entry/exit area and it STUNK. If you are not a smoker, this was not just annoying. It was terrible.
title: Clean & Maintain vs. Living on Name.
comment: The Starbucks coffee was great. Lots and lots of Starbucks coffee in the room. The bed was very comfortable with many pillows. The staff was courteous, friendly and helpful.

everyoneShouldKnow: Very clean and banquet staff specifically was excellent.
title: Hotel was great with one disappointment
comment: I was disappointed that we were unable to check emails (internet access from our room) without paying for each 24 hour period.

title: Nice hotel
comment: Very nice hotel. Room was comfortable with great bed as you would expect from Belvoir. Carpet needs replaced by didn't affect our positive view of the hotel. Only drawback: no club room. They say it's coming.

everyoneShouldKnow: The size of the rooms. Very open and comfortable
title: Loved It
comment: When I was planning this vacation, I read some reviews and was concerned. Have no idea why anyone would say anything negative. This was the best out of the 5 hotels we stayed in. So relaxing and the staff was great.

title: Great Customer Service
comment: We were greeted warmly by every staff member we encountered. From the staff at registration to the cleaning staff.

everyoneShouldKnow: There are two towers not very conveniently together
title: Nice view
comment: The hotel was comfortable and airport noise was not a factor. Being in separate tower made us feel a little isolated and we used amenities less than we would have if in main tower. Spent more time near downtown so likely should've stayed near there to avoid hotel parking and then downtown parking.

everyoneShouldKnow: Make sure you request a room in the Marina Tower.
title: Not really part of the main hotel
comment: Stayed at this hotel for a conference. Unfortunately was booked into the Bay Tower, which is completely seperate from the main hotel and conference center. Had to walk 1/2 mile to the main hotel for a starbucks, a real pool, fitness center, and a decent meal. Pool at the Bay Tower in need of significant repairs, pool surface is peeling. Rooms were clean but extremely out of date, peeling wallpaper, dripping shower head, water was cut off due to a burst pipe at the entire complex. The main hotel guests received notification, but the folks in the Bay Tower got no information and small plastic glasses of water to brush teeth and face. The overall hotel location was also poor, close to the airport with a free shuttle, but not close to any of the activities in Downtown San Diego, no shuttles provided - so you had to take a cab $15 - 20 each way. The only restaurant in the Bay Tower was overpriced and service was slow.

title: Being Green Questionable, Drink Prices Sky High
comment: I signed up for the Being Green option once I was checked in. This means linen services are only completed after every 4 nights stayed. While I applaud the hotel for offering this option, it wasn't clearly communicated to the staff. Used wash clothes were taken away every day and no clean ones were left. Used towels were taken away every day and more clean ones left. By the time, I left my room after six days, my husband and I used 12 towels and had accumulated six new towels. On day four, I had to call the concierge to ask for two more washcloths because we had none, and then they delivered four. And while Im talking about being green, dont offer the option of refusing the cost of the paper left at my door every morning at the end of the stay. Give me that option when I check in and save that paper!

title: Great for Business
comment: Stayed here a couple weeks ago and was very impressed with the staff's service level. Very knowledgable and willing to go the extra mile. Thank you for your hospitality

title: Relaxing Stay
comment: My stay was an extremely peaceful, relaxing experience.

title: This hotel is very convienient.
comment: I had a big problem with the heater,(cold and then water shoooting everywhere) I got immediate help from the staff but unfortunately the room they moved me into the heat didn't work either but I was to tired to notice until I woke up in the morning very cold.Temp 66. The front desk people were very good as well and took the price of one of my days off the bill. I appreciated it.

title: Great Stay
comment: Great stay and Great staff.

everyoneShouldKnow: Close to the football stadium and amusement park.
title: Great hotel
comment: This hotel is great as the people are courteous and friendly! Its location is optimal if you are conducting business in Ft. Worth. WiFi access was somewhat problematic for me.

title: BROUGHT MY DOG!
comment: I was thrilled I was able to bring my dog. I think we were on the "dog wing" on the 1st floor which was a perfect location. The room itself was a bit rundown unfortunately. The curtain ws stained, the bathroom ceiling was peeling, the lighting in the bathroom was dim, and the water pressure in the shower was not that strong.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is very close to NYC. Take the 158 bus and you are there.
title: close to NYC
comment: This was a lovely hotel. When you book it, be sure to specify a king or double bedded room. They only had double bedded rooms when we arrived and we wanted a king.

everyoneShouldKnow: Within walking distance of many restaurants and destinations.
title: Loved the green option!
comment: Great location, very bright and clean. Have the option of declining room servicing for a $5 credit or points daily.

title: Character Abounds
comment: The Gunter is impressive from the moment you walk in. It is a very beautiful and very functional hotel in a great location. It is an old building so you get some of the good with the bad (room size and such)

title: hotel
comment: this was a nice hotel and it meet all my need.

everyoneShouldKnow: Location is excelent for Epcot activities
title: Excellent Epcot Location
comment: Normally I dislike conferences that are held in family friendly andchild-like fun locations. Why? Cause its not fair that they get to play and I have to work.
