comment: We have stayed at the Belvoir in the past and had a wonderful stay. This time not so much. The drive that picked us up from the airport was rude and late. After standing in the cold until 12:15am, we called the hotel. They told us the driver was on his way. The driver was rude and informed us that they run every 20 minutes. Well, we waited longer than that. The room was fine, except the toilet didn't stop running water when flushed. It required several handle adjustments after each use. Very annoying.

everyoneShouldKnow: Close to central shopping district in Downtown Seattle.
title: Hotel Location
comment: If your needing to stay in a hotel close to shopping, restaurants and theaters this is it.

title: Most comfortable rooms
comment: The bed was so soft & nest like I wanted to stay another night. Deep sleep relaxing.

everyoneShouldKnow: Beautiful hotel right on the river.
title: Great Stay
comment: Had a great stay here last July. Room was nice and comfortable. Good BPG benefits. Beautiful hotel very close to Navy Pier.

title: transversing within the hotel
comment: The elevator service was excellent considering the fact that there were so many people in the hotel for the Conference.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location near Convention Center and downtown sports facilities.
title: Great Conference Hotel - Poor Club Room
comment: Attended a conference here and spent 6 nights. We upgraded for Club Access. The room, complimentary water and internet were fine. But Club Room was very disappointing. The Honor Bar was more like a "Dishonor Bar." Empty bottles of wine and beer with a sign saying to check with staff for pricing - but rarely were staff present. Very atypical Club Room.

title: Great place to stay
comment: For our event, everything went well for us. Great rooms, food, service, etc. Great bartender as well. She could have closed but kept it open for our group.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great customer service is a big part of this hotel.
title: Wonderful stay
comment: The Belvoir Riverwalk was a joy from the moment I drove up. Every person was friendly and went out of their way to make my stay easy, comfortable and memorable. The hotel is conveniently located to restaurants, theaters, attractions and has a shuttle to take you to many of the sights. The restaurant has good food and wonderful desserts. I have stayed at the hotel several times and will stay every time I am in the Tampa area. The front desk (especially Thabani, Jennifer and Denise) staff are awesome!

title: this hotel has a wonderful staff
comment: The staff goes above and beyond to make everyone feel welcome

title: food at reception
comment: I attend a conference ....will always remember how great the food was prepared at each of our receptions

everyoneShouldKnow: There is a wonderful old barber shop that is still operating M-F 9 to 5 daily.
title: COO at Practice Dynamics
comment: Hotel employees smiled and welcomed me to the hotel. They seemed genuinely glad to have me as a guest and answered every question fully and nicely. The old barber shop downstairs is a great slice of American history.

title: Access problem
comment: My stay was for a conference, dealing with a medical issue that causes problems with walking (GBS/CIDP symposium). In general, things were fine. However, I chose to do self-parking, which was in the back lot. I was very disappointed that the back entrance was not handicapped-accessible. It required me to go all the way around to the front of the building, which was not pleasant. I am sure having one front handicapped entrance meets legal requirements, but I was disappointed in this.

everyoneShouldKnow: Just North of the new City Centre and Galleria attractions in NW Houston.
title: Excellent Hotel in West Houston (Clay Rd)
comment: My team and I had week long business sessions with a very large oil & gas firm across the street. We were able to leverage their relationship with Belvoir to save driving in Houston traffic.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is easy to locate from the Freeway.
title: Mr. Jones, the front Manager was very helpful to resolve our issues.
comment: This hotel was fair, the front office, and entire staffs were for the most part, very helpful when help is requested. although, there was one lady Lopa (spelling) that was very hostile in her approach.

title: Belvoir Kauai
comment: The view from our OF room was outstanding and exceeded my expectations.

title: Tampa Belvoir
comment: Everything was upto the standard except the rear noise blocking double door which could not be closed all the way so had to bear the noise from 275 highway.

title: resturant needs
comment: Runfire was disapointment. Had to go off grounds to get a good dinner, Should keep Lava open til 7. This place is just a hotel calling itself a resort because it's on a beach.

everyoneShouldKnow: There is a beatiful sunken waterfall park across from the hotel that you should see and enjoy.
title: Dallas Fort Worth is worth it.
comment: Overall, the hotel was clean and comfortable, except for the one incident with dirty sheets/linen on the bed. Nice hotel.

title: Courtesy and going beyond the norm
comment: Front desk staff were extremely helpful before "Sandy" in securing additional nights if needed & then were just as courteous cancelling because I was able to leave on virtually the last flight out of Dulles. Hotel was extremely tolerant about singing & dancing "way past the hours" in our organizations' hospitality suite. In fact, the entire hotel was very quiet including my neighbors. KUDOS!

everyoneShouldKnow: Every room has a beautiful view of either the mountains or ocean.
title: Evacuation
comment: The public safety ordered an evacuation of the facility due to an impending tsunami. The staff facilitated this in an orderly and non-stressful manner. The hotel generously comped us for our breakfast the next morning for the inconvenience.

title: Reasons to stay at Belvoir Palo Alto
comment: Very convenient, pleasant environment, nicely furnished rooms

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location and foyer, pool area.
title: Location is great
comment: Enjoyed our stay at the Princess K, had heard the that it is a bit dated, and yes the rooms are. Having said that the room was spacious and the beds very comfy. Disappointed that the cleaner never replenished the soap, shampoo etc supplies throughout out weeks stay and that glasses used on the second day, were never cleaned or replaced with fresh ones. Small things, but I expected better from this hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: the evening entertainment at tne Edge
title: Loved the Leahi room
comment: We had a great time. much to do. The evening entertainment was great. Really enjoyed the hula dance and singing on our last night.

title: anniversary
comment: Went here for our 30th anniversary . And had a woderful stay. Loved the jaccuzzi suite next to the river .. thank you to everyone for making our day special :)

everyoneShouldKnow: Views to Waikiki beach and pool areas central to Waikiki
title: Belvoir Waikiki
comment: Stayed approximately 5 years ago and again last week. Hotel still excellent, missed the fine dining on the 30th floor, but still enjoyed the sunset from there.

everyoneShouldKnow: Better than many of the Disney Properties!! Will absolutely stay here from now on.
title: Amazing Honeymoon
comment: My wife and I were here for 10 days for our Honeymoon. Lisa, Elizabeth, and the team at the front desk treated us like gold. Our room and our bed was clean and comfortable. The pool was amazing and the bar was too. The team that took care of us while we enjoyed food and drinks by the pool was EXCELLENT!! Jason, Enrique, Ivanna, Mariana, and Samuel were all willing to go above and beyond every time they helped us. We made it a point to enjoy the pool before and after we went to Disney each day. Breakfast each day was fantastic. We were lucky to enjoy that each morning. Saving the BEST for last, My wife and I had the sincere PLEASURE of having BRENDA take care of us every morning at breakfast. She is a true example of what customer care is all about. She became a friend by the end of our stay and we truly look forward to seeing her again on our next visit. We have stayed many times in the Disney Hotels on their property. Their service and facilities paled in comparison to what we experienced during our 10 Days at the Belvoir Buena Vista. We visit Disney once or twice a year and will stay here from now on. We HIGHLY recommend this property and the team that keeps it as spectacular as it was for us.

title: friendly staff
comment: We have stayed in this hotel the last 3 yrs, and the stay is very pleasant, clean rooms , friendly staff , and a great location to go from the hotel to anywhere in dallas .

title: Really nice location
comment: Over all great place to stay enjoyed my time there. The place was beautiful and the room was really nice and comfortable. Only negative thing would be the front desk lady failed to let us know there was a shuttle from Belvoir that transported you to the bay tower, it wouldn't of been a big deal except I told her I needed help with my luggage since it had broke and her only advice was walk to my car and drive to the bay tower. Later we came to find out from the receptionist from the bay tower that there was a shuttle that could of brought us back.

title: Happy bed
comment: Our room was very comfortable. Great bed and room design. I actually used the divan!

everyoneShouldKnow: How helpful the entire staff were! From the front door to reception to security assistance in the middle of the night. We were safe secure and cared for all the way.
title: Hotel has the best staff.
comment: How helpful the entire staff were! From the front door to reception to security assistance in the middle of the night. We were safe, secure and cared for all the way. Quality of service, location and quality of service. Did I say how great the staff were at meeting our needs every time, and we had several times.

title: Beautiful comfy hotel
comment: I enjoyed myself. I stayed overnight. The Room was very spacious & the bed was super comfy!! The staff was nice although I would recommend they provide something as simple as corkscrew in every room (it's a suite with kitchenette ) because the front desk had none & the bartender didn't have an extra. Had to literally bring down the bottle of wine however the bartender was very nice & apologized for the inconvenience. All in all , had a wonderful experience & would recommend to anyone

everyoneShouldKnow: No spa and the pool isn't heated. Also, despite being next to the mall, there is no simple or easy access to mall and its shops.
title: expected more
comment: The 'heated pool' was cold. When we asked about it we were told by the front desk that it should be warm and they would look into it. That was the first evening of a 4 night say. It was never warm. It's bad enough it was never warm, it's another thing to straight lie to your guests about it.

everyoneShouldKnow: conveniece to syracuse University; free airport shuttle; clean
title: Perfect!
comment: Every thing was nice the staff was especially helpful....I like the feature of having to swipe your room card in the elevator before it goes up to the guest rooms. I had not experienced this before ..guess I need to get out more often.

everyoneShouldKnow: The Groupon Deal is a steal for this place!
title: A Pleasant Surprise
comment: From the moment we checked in we were met with open arms and given complete attention and right across from the casino was the best and the tv's were huge and the bed was like a cloud and the view was right out to the casino and the TGIF was incredible and the Starbucks was delicious and the pool was like bath water...need i say more?! I would say the only thing that took me was the cost of parking as i didnt expect to pay for parking since was a guest of the hotel but who knows maybe it is always like that.

title: My stay was too short!
comment: I only stayed one night, unfortunately. The hotel staff was incredibly helpful and responsive. My bed was so comfortable and I loved having a balcony overlooking the oceanfront. The in room coffee was great and having a refrigerator in the room was perfect!

title: Did Not enjoy My stay at all
comment: This hotel provides for you in your room, NO microwave oven, NO refrigerator, NO free internet services The walls are paper thin, at 3:30 a.m., I was awake by the couple next door making love. I heard both of them reach their climax.

title: guest
comment: Bathroom never cleaned to my satisfaction although the shower features are good,

title: Great stay
comment: This hotel had one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept on in a hotel. The room was spacious and comfortable. Staff were unfailingly cordial and helpful. The restaurant and snack market offered good selections, well prepared and promptly served. I was very pleased with my entire experience at the Belvoir Arlington.

everyoneShouldKnow: Prime location. Nice hotel, but crowded
title: Pleasant stay
comment: This is the second time we stayed at this hotel. I would say this is an average hotel. The room was clean but could use some updating. The hotel was extremely crowded. Note this was the only hotel that I have ever stayed in that I couldn't extend the check out time as a gold BPG member. In the evening we would sit out by the pool and have drinks. The only issue with this was that most of the time we had to go up to the bar to get drinks even though there was a one or two waitresses and in the evening the crowd was minimal. The location of the hotel is excellent it is in walking distance of wakiki beach and shopping. I would recommend this hotel even with the few issues it has. We enjoyed our stay.

title: Great place to stay
comment: Right at 610 exit, easy frm 59

everyoneShouldKnow: The hotel was very convenient to central shopping stores, Broadway and restaurants.
title: Very pleased with the room accomodations
comment: Our family stay at the hotel exceeded our expectations. The room was comfortable and not as small as some quoted reviews expressed by a couple of guests. The staff was very courteous and helpful. I look forward to my next visit to New York and stay with Belvoir Hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Everyone that works there is very helpful.
title: Great hotel features
comment: Have stayed here 2 times. Very satisfied with both stays. Everyone that works there is very helpful.
